name: Shingeki no Kafka Kaiju Guren Langan
name_original: Shingeki no Kafka Kaiju Guren Langan
description:
"One morning, as Gregor Samsa was waking up from anxious dreams, he discovered that in bed he had been changed into a monstrous verminous bug."

In an uncontrollable hunger that consumes everything in front of him, Samsa undergoes a growth. 

Move him with asdw or arrows. Use tab to look at the minimap. Press escape to pause/restart.
